solution_line_template: The number of students that play sports is {total_students} * {percent_play_sports} = <<{total_students}*{percent_play_sports}={num_play_sports}>>{num_play_sports} students.
The number of students that play soccer is {num_play_sports} * {percent_play_soccer} = <<{num_play_sports}*{percent_play_soccer}={num_play_soccer}>>{num_play_soccer} students
